Reviews.Title: Quiet, a little hard to figure out, but works great.
Reviews.Author: ComputRFixer
Reviews.Content: There is no "Standard" for the way these things work. Every one I have used works differently, but once you figure this one out, it works well, and is really quiet. It was the easiest to set up to view over a smart phone and on my laptop. Now I can see outside throughout the house while I am wireless on my laptop instead of having to go to the room where the DVR sits, or I can view from work on my android smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Dann R. Cuellar "Music Buff"
Reviews.Content: Works very quietly in the background. And the smart phone compatibility is awesome & easy to use making it possible to monitor from any where in the world.
